briefTitle: Evaluation Protocols for Isolation of Analytes From Urine for Future Oncology Applications
officialTitle: Evaluation Protocols for Isolation of Analytes From Urine for Future Oncology Applications
conditions: Breast Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Urine, Liquid Biopsy
primaryOutcomeMeasure: General DNA or RNA concentration measured using Qubit
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Being at least 18 years old
* Being able to understand and read Dutch
* For cancer patients specifically: patients suffering from local and systemic cancers (e.g. breast, prostate cancer)

Exclusion Criteria:

* For cancer patients specifically: patients suffering from a blood cancer
